reviewText:
The vendor is being  as helpful as he can, but both he and I have been victimized (perhaps inadvertently) by the publisher.

The copy of the disk he sent me was defective; it played a series of uninteresting trailers, but as soon as the main feature started, the disk would play no further.

The vendor offered me a choice: if I wanted a refund, he would send it immediately; if I wanted a replacement, it might take a few weeks. I opted for replacement, and am waiting.

Please do not consider this a black mark against the vendor. I am confident that he is doing all he can to straighten out a problem that was not his fault.

ISSUES ALL RESOLVED. Lovely full frontal scenes of a naked woman being whipped.
